notes_text: Possession of up to 6 g of cannabis (or 2 g of hashish) is an administrative offense, punishable by a fine of ₽5,000 or detention of up to 15 days. Possession of larger amounts is a criminal offense. Foreign nationals and stateless individuals who violate the law are subject to deportation regardless of the amount.
notes: Possession of up to 6 g of cannabis (or 2 g of hashish) is an administrative offense, punishable by a fine of ₽5,000 or detention of up to 15 days. Possession of larger amounts is a criminal offense. Foreign nationals and stateless individuals who violate the law are subject to deportation regardless of the amount.
notes_raw: {{main|Cannabis in Russia}} Possession of up to {{cvt|6|g|frac=5}} of cannabis (or {{cvt|2|g|frac=20|disp=comma}} of hashish) is an administrative offense, punishable by a fine of [[Russian ruble|₽]]5,000 or detention of up to 15 days. Possession of larger amounts is a criminal offense.
